body.name: Zalman IF120 Infinity Mirror ARGB 120mm Case Fans, Silent 3-Pin Addressable RGB Fans for Computer Case & Liquid Radiator, 1200RPM Smooth and Silent Fans, 55.2 CFM, ARGB Controller Included (3 Pack)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 19 mins
features: Addressable RGB: 120mm fan with addressable sync for vivid and colorful RGB LED effects. This 3-Pack includes an ARGB controller.
Infinity Mirror: The center of the fan is an infinity mirror that creates a series of visually striking reflections that recede infinitely into the distance. The color is vibrant in every direction.

Silent Operation: Fan uses smooth hydraulic bearings that do not come into contact with bare metal, instead a thin layer of lubricant replaces bearings. This generates very low noise and heat for buttery and quiet operation and prevent excess heat from forming inside the computer case.
Max fan speed: 1200RPM, Max Airflow: 55.2CFM, Max Noise: 21 dB(A), Fan Bearing: Hydraulic Bearing, Weight: 130g, Rated Voltage: 12V Fan, 5V LED.
Fan has a 3-pin connector and another 3-pin for the ARGB.
body.description: ZM-IF120A3 RGB Cooling Fan & Infinity Mirror ZALMAN’s Z-SYNC Addressable RGB supports a variety of modes and tuning effects to make your new gaming PC more vibrant/colorful.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ZM-IF120A3 RGB Cooling Fan & Infinity Mirror ZALMAN’s Z-SYNC Addressable RGB supports a variety of modes and tuning effects to make your new gaming PC more vibrant/colorful. 1-to-2 Addressable RGB Splitter Cable Limitless ARGB Lighting Effect 120mm ARGB Fan Motherboard ARGB Sync Fan : 3-Pin / LED : 3-Pin (Addressable RGB)

120mm Addressble RGB Fan 120mm Addressable RGB Fan Infinity RGB Lighting EffectProvides a vibrant and infinite RGB color to computer case Hydraulic Bearing There is no friction or oil leaks, low noise and long service life. Limitless ARGB Lighting Effect Infinity ARGB lighting is perfect in any direction.

Motherboard Addressable RGB LED Sync Support ZALMAN’s Z-SYNC Addressable RGB supports a variety of modes and tuning effects to make your new gaming PC more vibrant/colorful. 1-to-2 Addressable RGB Splitter Cable Pre-Installed Anti-Vibration Rubber Pads The housing is made of rugged material. It has excellent durability and anti-vibration rubber pads for minimizing the vibration generated during fan operation. *The front and rear are equipped with a total of eight anti-vibration runner pads.

Specifications Dimensions 120 x 120 x 27(H)mm Materials PBT, PC Weight 130g Fan Bearing Type Hydraulic Bearing Fan Speed 1,200RPM ± 10% Max. Fan Noise Level 21.0dB(A) ± 10% Max. Fan Air Flow 55.2CFM ± 10% Max. Fan Air Pressure 1.95mmH₂O ± 10% Fan Life Span 50,000hours Fan Connector Type Fan : 3-Pin / LED : 3-Pin (Addressable RGB) Rated Voltage Fan : 12V DC / LED : 5V DC Rating Current Fan : 0.3A / LED : 0.48A

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything you need is in the kit,The fans are beautiful and quiet and easy to install.Edit:Update a couple days later one fan is ticking and it’s annoying

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After having one of my fans die I decided to give these fans a try. They match perfectly with my AIO.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great price and customer service.
reviews.reviewText: Bought these to complete a build that had similar; different branded fans. Had one that came glitched/dead and they sent out a replacement. These work great and look good; airflow is decently moderate and sound idk :)Would buy again.Update (5-14-23): All 3 fans have atleast one bugged/glitched LED. Would be a deal breaker for me but I personally don’t stare at my pc; I’ll still give 3 stars for their customer service and price standpoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT option for ARGB fans
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with these fans. I purchased them for use with an older mATX motherboard that sports only a single 3-pin fan header. This kit comes equipped with a generously long 1-to-3 3-pin fan header connection splitter. The control module is powered by a SATA plug, so you can ditch the old-school Molex connector to a 3-pin header adapter to power your fans if you're short of fan headers on your motherboard like I am. The control module case sports a built-in magnet so you can securely place it in a convenient location in your case. The control module is capable of supporting up to 4 fans, so if you have an ARGB fan on your CPU heatsink, you're all set. It works with modern ARGB motherboards like Gigabyte's RGB Fusion or Asus' Aura solutions. But, for folks sporting non-ARGB motherboards like I am, all you need to do is press the button on top of the control module, and you will cycle through multiple colors and multiple lighting display styles, such as: solid, spiraling or pulsing. As you can see in the images, I opted for a solid rainbow color pattern. As far as noise level goes, they are quieter than the 92mm Artic Cooling CPU heatsink fan, so comparatively, they're silent. ;) The fans themselves are built well. Not as good as some high-end $30 each Corsair I've used, but they are leagues ahead of the fans Cooler Master included with my MasterBox NR400 case. As a nice bonus, all 4 corners of both sides of the fan shroud have rubber to help eliminate noise from fan vibration.It would have been nice if the fans had rotation and airflow arrows on the shroud. The instructions could have been a bit more thorough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good looking effect, original and different !
reviews.reviewText: I like these fans, but I opted on my other fans I had previously. While I do like the effect these offer with the mirrored hub, the lack of outer led's was a deal breaker for me. Still, for someone not as obsessed with MORE led's, and wanting a different take on an ARGB fan, these are the perfect fit for that scenario. I also think with these being just a standard 3 wire DC fan, and not a PWM 4 wire fan, you are limited to just using these as air intake and exhaust fans. Which would be fine for a lot of applications, but they are not something I'd use for everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars seems to be good.
reviews.reviewText: the fan works fine but it doesn't work for my application. I thought the rgb was tied to the 3 pin connector but it is separate. my motherboard is just a little to old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Zalman fan 3 pack is your best deal
reviews.reviewText: I bought a new Asus case for my recent PC build. It came with 4 fans but one was not RGB, so I started looking for a replacement for that one and come across this 3 pack.The extra 2 went in the top of the case as more exhaust. They all work and look great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the infinity mirror
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, pulls more air than the stock Corsair fan that came with the case. Lowered my temps by 3-5 degrees just with this change to exhaust
